verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah,<s%> when he had <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in a <S%H5612>book<s%> at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to you, O <S%H1263>Baruch:<s%>

You did <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H188>Woe<s%> is me <S%H4994>now!<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H3254>added<s%> <S%H3015>grief<s%> to my <S%H4341>sorrow;<s%> I <S%H3021>fainted<s%> in my <S%H585>sighing,<s%> and I <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4496>rest.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> shall you <S%H559>say<s%> to him, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3541>thus;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H1129>built<s%> will I <S%H2040>break<s%> <S%H2040>down,<s%> and that <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5193>planted<s%> I will <S%H5428>pluck<s%> up, even <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

And <S%H1245>seek<s%> you <S%H1419>great<s%> things for yourself? <S%H1245>seek<s%> them not: for, <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> but your <S%H5315>life<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> to you for a <S%H7998>prey<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4725>places<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H3212>go.<s%>
